name: Ferdinand delafosee
coverLetter: First time trimming professionally, but highly motivated,I've been growing and trimming for personal used in the past, ready to work as much hour as possible!!!, every man need to eat  so if you provide two meal a day and a spot for my tent I can start ASAP from now until mid-December ! I'm also a certified yoga teacher so can provided proper way to stretch during break  to people who are interested. I'm saying it again I'm really highly motivated and ready to work hard!!
